shorttext.p:
You can learn your STB remote control to control the most important functions of your TV.
In the following, simply press the buttons indicated in the wizard on your TV remote control. Your TV remote control will be identified and your STB remote control will be updated to control the volume and power functions of your TV.
Press ok on your STB remote control to start the wizard.

Hold your TV remote control towards your set-top box.
Press and hold the Volume Up button on your TV remote control. Once the button is recognized, the wizard will automatically proceed to the next button.

Hold your TV remote control towards your set-top box.
Press and hold the Volume Down button on your TV remote control. Once the button is recognized, the wizard will automatically proceed to the next button.

Hold your TV remote control towards your set-top box.
Press and hold the Mute button on your TV remote control. Once the button is recognized, the wizard will automatically proceed to the next button.

Take the STB remote control in your hand! Hold it like you do for controlling your set top box. Your modifications will be uploaded when you press OK on your STB remote control.
Please be patient as this might take some seconds. When the upload is finished, a notification will inform you about the success of the process.
